comment: There exists a unique decomposition of a prime as a sum of squares of two different positive integers iff the prime is of the form ` 4 k + 1 ` . Double restricted existential uniqueness variant of ~ 2sqreunnltb . (Contributed by AV, 5-Jul-2023.)
